project_description: A simple Flutter app with a login screen and a home screen, using Cubit for state management.
architecture_overview: The app is built using the Cubit pattern for state management. It consists of two main screens: a login screen and a home screen. The state is managed using Cubits, and the data models are used to represent the user data.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
User -> LoginScreen: Open app
LoginScreen -> LoginCubit: login(email, password)
LoginCubit -> User: Validate credentials
LoginCubit -> HomeScreen: Navigate to home
HomeScreen -> HomeCubit: logout()
HomeCubit -> LoginScreen: Navigate back to login
@enduml
state_management_flow: The state is managed using Cubits. When a user logs in, the LoginCubit validates the credentials and navigates to the HomeScreen. The HomeCubit handles the logout functionality and navigates back to the LoginScreen.
navigation_flow: The app starts with the LoginScreen. Upon successful login, the user is navigated to the HomeScreen. The HomeScreen contains a logout button which, when pressed, navigates the user back to the LoginScreen.
